description:
Single minded, Nagi Kirima goes through life with only one purpose: root out and destroy evil. A lonely life, but one her father would have approved of. But her pursuits have left little time for a personal life. Up to now it hasn`t been a problem...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: She`s So Unusual 彼女の生き方
She`s So Unusual: Kanojo no Ikikata
